## intersect package

svelte action - `use:intersect` svelte action that wraps IntersectionObserver

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [intersect(node, parameters)](./intersect.intersect.md) | Create an IntersectionObserver that observers the node |
